original: Andersson, Knut Axel Ingemar, redaktionssekreterare, Uddevalla, f. 20/1/09 i Arbrå, Gävleb. 1. G. 40 m. Gerda Andersson. Barn: Jan f. 42. — Stud. v. Västerbergs folkhögsk. 30-31, Brunnsviks fodkhögsk. 31-32. Platsred. i Arbrå f. Häls. Folkbl. 35-37, i Bollnäs 38-39, medarb. i Nya Norrl. i Sollefteå 40-4’5, red:sekr. i Kuriren fr. 45. Ordf. i Sollefteå arb:-komm. 43-44, v. ordf. i Uddevalla arb :komm. fr. 47, led. av verkst. utsk. f. Gävleb. soc :dem. ungd:distr. 30-38. Hobby: flugfiske.
translated: Andersson, Knut Axel Ingemar, editorial secretary, Uddevalla, b. January 20th, 1909 in Arbrå, Gävleb. 1st marriage to Gerda Andersson in 1940. Children: Jan b. 1942. Studied at Västerbergs folk high school from 1930-1931, Brunnsviks folk high school from 1931-1932. Was a local editor in Arbrå for Häls. Folkbl from 1935-1937, in Bollnäs from 1938-1939, and a collaborator in Nya Norrl. in Sollefteå from 1940-1945. Became an editorial secretary for Kuriren in 1945. Was the chairman of Sollefteå labor committee from 1943-1944, deputy chairman of Uddevalla labor committee from 1947, and a member of the executive committee for Gävleb. soc:dem. ungd:distr. from 1930-1938. Hobby: fly fishing.
